SELECT GOODS_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, PRICE, HASHTAG, VIEW_CNT, IMAGE, GOODS_STATE, REQ_TYPE, REQ_DATE, RESP_DATE, CATEGORY_ID, MEMBER_ID, SCORE_ID FROM (SELECT /*+ INDEX(m SYS_C008499) */ ROWNUM rn, GOODS_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, PRICE, HASHTAG, VIEW_CNT, IMAGE, GOODS_STATE, REQ_TYPE, REQ_DATE, RESP_DATE, CATEGORY_ID, MEMBER_ID, SCORE_ID FROM (SELECT * FROM GOODS WHERE MEMBER_ID IN (SELECT MEMBER_ID FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_TYPE='SELLER')
AND GOODS_STATE = 'SALE'
AND CATEGORY_ID IN (SELECT CATEGORY_ID FROM CATEGORIES WHERE NAME = #{category})
AND NAME LIKE '%'||#{sl}||'%'
AND PRICE BETWEEN ${price1} AND ${price2}
ORDER BY score_id DESC
ORDER BY req_date
ORDER BY price
ORDER BY price DESC
ORDER BY req_date DESC
)
WHERE ROWNUM <= (${page}*6)) b
WHERE rn > (${page} - 1) * 6

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GOODS WHERE MEMBER_ID IN (SELECT MEMBER_ID FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_TYPE='SELLER')
AND CATEGORY_ID IN (SELECT CATEGORY_ID FROM CATEGORIES WHERE NAME = #{category})
AND NAME LIKE '%'||#{sl}||'%'
AND PRICE BETWEEN ${price1} AND ${price2}

SELECT goods_id, name, description, price, req_date, member_id FROM (SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(b PK_GOODS) */ rownum rn, b.* FROM goods b
WHERE rownum <= (#{page} * 5)
AND member_id = #{memberId} ) a WHERE (a.rn > (#{page} - 1) * 5)

SELECT goods_id, name, description, price, req_date, member_id FROM (SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(b PK_GOODS) */ rownum rn, b.* FROM goods b
WHERE rownum <= (#{page} * 5)
AND goods_state = 'SOLDOUT' ) a WHERE (a.rn > (#{page} - 1) * 5)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM goods WHERE goods_state = 'SOLDOUT'
SELECT goods_id, name, description, image, price, req_date, member_id, goods_state FROM goods WHERE goods_id = #{goodsId}
